Dragon Blast.name: Dragon Blast
Dragon Blast.flavor: As a wound opens, your boiling blood blinds nearby enemies.
Dragon Blast.attack:
Constitution + 4 vs. Reflex
Increase to Constitution + 6 vs. Reflex at 21st level.
Dragon Blast.onHit: 2d6 + Constitution modifier damage, and the target is blinded until the end of your next turn.

Ancestral Manifestation.name: Ancestral Manifestation
Ancestral Manifestation.flavor: Drawing vitality from your draconic legacy, you channel the blood rage of your ancestors.
Ancestral Manifestation.effect: Your hit points fall to your bloodied value, and you gain temporary hit points equal to the hit points you lost by using this power. Until you have no temporary hit points, you gain resistance to all damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

Dragonbreath Strike.name: Dragonbreath Strike
Dragonbreath Strike.flavor: Each time you swing your weapon, you release a blast of your dragon breath.
Dragonbreath Strike.effect: Until the stance ends, when you deal damage with a melee attack against an adjacent enemy, the attack deals extra damage equal to your Constitution modifier. The extra damage is the same damage type as your dragon breath.
